articles.author: Lallalit Srijandorn
articles.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD recovers some lost ground above $2,050, US ADP report eyed - FXStreet
articles.description: Gold price (XAU/USD) bounces off the multi-day lows near $2030 per ounce and hovers around $2,042 during the early Asian session on Thursday.
articles.content:
• Gold price recovers its losses around $2,060, up 0.14% for the day.
  • The US ISM Manufacturing PMI came in at 47.4 vs. 46.7 prior, better than the expectation of 47.1.
